title: Ideally positioned land close to Tangalle - LIP 123
details: LIP-123 A land with 130 Perches situated 300m from the main road and only 150m from the unspoiled and swimmable beach of Mawalla. A square shaped property with good access, quiet and tranquil area, it has wonderful foliage and trees, and is only 15 minutes’ drive from Tangalle town.
